name: Overgrown Villa
description: A luxurious villa that once housed the wealthy now lies abandoned and reclaimed by nature. The architectural beauty and potential hidden treasures attract explorers, while the overgrown gardens can provide food and materials for those who know how to use them.
atmosphere: Footsteps echo through chambers that once housed wealthy. Air carries wildflowers, old wealth, and hidden treasures scent. Luxurious architecture peeks through tangled vines and overgrown gardens like sleeping beauty. Skin tingles with sense of architectural beauty and potential hidden wealth. Taste of lost luxury and natural reclamation fills mouth. Weight of abandoned luxury and overgrown gardens presses down on you.
